H0.text: what country does david luiz play for. Portugal

H1.text: what country does david luiz play for. Spain

H2.text: what country does david luiz play for. Argentina

H3.text: what country does david luiz play for. Brazil

A4.text: David Luiz made his full international debut for Brazil in 2010 and has since earned more than 50 caps for his country.

A5.text: He received his first call-up to Brazilian senior squad for a friendly match against the United States on 10 August 2010 after Mano Menezes replaced Dunga as national team coach.
